title: Canine Companions
description: Bedtime stories for kids, written by kids. From paddling pooches to the power of puppy eyes, tail-wagging tales from the BBC Radio 2 Breakfast Show 500 Words competition.
itunes:subtitle: Tail-wagging tales from the BBC Radio 2 Breakfast Show 500 Words competition.
